dimension: 93 x 1 1/4 in. (236.22 x 3.18 cm) (without fringes or pompons)
title: Woman's hair band
description: bright multicolors; geometric and floral designs and motifs with pairs of doll images; long fringes with thick pompons that include shiny plastic strips
